html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05062024-05-09TBS
ActPublic Service Superannuation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Supplementary Death Benefit Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SUPPLEMENTARY DEATH BENEFIT REGULATIONS in order to (1) allow the plan participants to name up to five beneficiaries, which include registered charitable organizations, but excludes corporations; (2) outline the essential criteria for making a valid designation rather than referencing a prescribed form; (3) permit the use of digital communication for beneficiary designation and communication with the Government of Canada Pension Centre; and (4) clarify language and update terminology to be gender neutral.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0085 Publication Date: 2024-05-22
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SUPPLEMENTARY DEATH BENEFIT REGULATIONS in order to (1) allow the plan participants to name up to five beneficiaries, which include registered charitable organizations, but excludes corporations; (2) outline the essential criteria for making a valid designation rather than referencing a prescribed form; (3) permit the use of digital communication for beneficiary designation and communication with the Government of Canada Pension Centre; and (4) clarify language and update terminology to be gender neutral.
